Pre-Game Insights: Malawi National Football Team, the Flames, have a make or break encounter when they face Burkina Fasoâ€™s Stallions in the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) qualifiers.
Both teams are aiming for their first victory in the qualifiers after dropping points in their respective opening matches.
The Flames started the 2025 Afcon qualifiers with a surprise 3-2 defeat to Burundi whereas the Stallions held Senegal to a 1-1 draw.
The Flames' coach, Patrick Mabedi, admitted that the team needs a positive result against the Stallions tonight.
Mabedi emphasized the importance of discipline and attacking when the team loses the ball.
The Stallions boast of a lot of quality in their squad, including players like Edmond Tapsoba, Issa Kabore, Dango Ouattara, Bertrand Traore, Trova Boni, Sancha Banse, and Hassane Bande.
